description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the out-of-bounds write vulnerability in Adobe Acrobat Reader that could lead to arbitrary code execution:

1. Ensure you are running the latest version of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based).
2. Update to Microsoft Edge version 128.0.2739.42 or later.

**Details**:
- This version addresses security vulnerabilities that may be exploited if the user opens a malicious file.
- For more details on the update, refer to the security update guide: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-41879.

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that your Microsoft Edge browser is up to date by checking under Help and feedback > About Microsoft Edge.
- Backup any critical data before performing the update.
